00068 // I'm including these two functions from OSG 3.1.1 because the wrap on the last
00069 // line of text doesn't center properly in previous versions. When OSG packaging
00070 // moves to 3.1+, we can remove this stuff
00071 class spinTextNode : public osgText::Text
00072 {
00073 protected:
00074     osgText::String::iterator computeLastCharacterOnLine(osg::Vec2& cursor, osgText::String::iterator first, osgText::String::iterator last);
00075     void computeGlyphRepresentation();
00076 };
00077

00115         // these are an exact copy of osgText::Text::BackdropType
